bibl.title: The "Performative Future" in Three Hellenistic Incantations and Theocritus' Second Idyll.
bibl.note: The "performative future" describes an ongoing performance in sophisticated literary genres. We have the same phenomenon at work in ritual situations (encomiastic poetry, hymns, and magical incantations).
